title: Mixed Signals
body:
Just played a regular game, with an Anivia on the other team. She was supporting, and as far as I could tell, playing seriously until her adc died, and she started flaming. Then she pretty much stopped caring and messing around.

I don't encourage trolling, but it was norms and she was being pretty funny so I started running around with her doing stuff. Just having a good old time.

After the game, she mystery gifted me, saying 'teehee'. I thought this was really nice, (although it was a heimer skin) and added her, to say thanks. Immediately, she said, mind my language, "f*** off g** c***", and unfriended me.

EDIT: She just re added me and hasn't said anything yet. I dunno, weird person I guess.

EDIT 2: Said "that heimer skin is cool lols", and unfriended me.

Weirdest person I've met on LoL.
